      • getServletRequestContext

        public Context getServletRequestContext(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                        javax.servlet.ServletResponse response)
        Deprecated. Use method with explicit injector name ContextFactory#getServletRequestContext(String, ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
        Create common context from request and response objects. Returned Context will delegate it stored/reads to request object.
        Specified by:
        getServletRequestContext in interface ContextFactory
        Parameters:
        request - request
        response - response
        Returns:
        Created Context from request and response objects. Returned Context will delegate it stored/reads to request object.

      • getServletRequestContext

        public Context getServletRequestContext(String injectorName,
                                        javax.servlet.ServletRequest request,
                                        javax.servlet.ServletResponse response)
        Create Context from request and response objects. Returned Context will delegate it stored/reads to request object - it will behave a bit like RequestScope from Slice 1.0. Returned Context will contain entries for ServletRequest.class, ServletResponse.class and Resource.class with RequestedResourcePath attribute.
        Specified by:
        getServletRequestContext in interface ContextFactory
        Parameters:
        injectorName - name of injector for which a context will be created
        request - servlet request to be stored in context and which will be used to keep all values from this context
        response - servlet response to be stored in context
        Returns:
        context containing request, response and resource read from request

      • getResourceResolverContext

        public Context getResourceResolverContext(org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
        Create Context from resourceResolver object. Returned Context will store all objects in itself - it will behave as per-thread context. Returned Context will contain entry for ResourceResolver.class. No ServletRequest.class or ServletResponse.class will be available for injector.
        Specified by:
        getResourceResolverContext in interface ContextFactory
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - ResourceResolver to be stored in the context
        Returns:
        context containing specified resource resolver
